original_title: Par-delà les nuages – Le cinéma de Marion Hänsel
overview: On the basis of conversations with Hänsel and some of her permanent crew members, a remarkable portrait is created of a filmmaker who is also her own producer, i.e. boss. The relationship between characters and their natural environment plays a major role in her work that is often based on novels.
title: Par-delà les nuages – Le cinéma de Marion Hänsel
